players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Bob was killed. Vote her out."
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "I agree with Diana. Alice is the only suspect and has no alibi. Let's vote her out."
Diana: "Alice is the mafia that killed Bob. I have proof from my investigation. Vote her out. No other suspects remain."
You: "I don't know why you think I'm mafia. Maybe Charlie is the real suspect."
Charlie: "I trust Diana. Alice is mafia, no alibi. Vote her out."

players.name: Diana

Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Charlie: "I agree with Diana. Alice is the only suspect and has no alibi. Let's vote her out."
You: "Alice is the mafia that killed Bob. I have proof from my investigation. Vote her out. No other suspects remain."
